parameters.name: SQLReviewQueryKey
parameters.description: The key that is used to query the details of optimization suggestions. You can call the [ListSQLReviewOriginSQL](~~257870~~) operation to query the key.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to query the ID of the tenant.
